title: Allow odds input fields to be emptied without auto-filling

requirements.summary: Modify ContenderOddsRow component to allow numerator input fields to remain empty without auto-filling, enabling users to clear and replace values freely
acceptanceCriteria: User can click into an odds input field and delete all content, leaving it completely empty
Empty input fields do not auto-fill with '1' or any other value
Implied probability calculation only displays when a valid number (1-30) is present
User can type a new number into an empty field without the previous value reappearing
All 6 contender input fields should start empty by default when the New Bet page loads

file_operations.description: Update the numerator input state management to accept empty string values. Modify the onChange handler to allow empty string state without auto-filling to '1'. Update the input value binding to display empty string when no value is present. Adjust the implied probability calculation logic to only compute and display when a valid number (1-30) is entered, otherwise show no probability. Ensure the component initializes with empty string state for new bets.

Update the initial odds state to use empty strings instead of default numeric values for all six contenders. Ensure the odds array passed to ContenderOddsRow components allows empty string representation. Verify that the prediction calculation logic handles empty/invalid odds gracefully without throwing errors.
